title: The Cookie Drove My Best Friend Crazy
itunes:title: The Cookie Drove My Best Friend Crazy
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 28 year old woman and I have a male best friend. Well, I had a male best friend that I had been friends with since middle school. In 2016 I had a bad breakup and my best friend came over to console me. We were sitting side by side on my couch and he leaned over and kissed me. It felt so good to be held and kissed so passionately. Well, one thing led to another and I ended up giving him the cookie. We were shocked at how good it was and we did it a few more times before he left the next morning. After that, it was over............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
